QuestData.Title: A Lesson in Witch Hunting
QuestData.Description:
While I appreciate the dedication that went into compiling this tome, this thing reads like engineering instructions for a siege engine!
I'll need some time to comb through this information for anything that might be useful to us. I wouldn't mind some assistance, if you have a moment.
For starters, I could use some more light in here...
QuestData.LogDescription: Assist Lucille Waycrest as she studies the Tome of Ash and Silver.
QuestData.RewardText:
Ah, you found it! Excellent.
<Lucille produces a long sewing needle from the kit>
...You look confused. Let me explain.
